name: js-project-initializer
description: A tool to initialize a nodejs project or frontend project.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc
scripts.test:ui-component: cd tests/ui-component/ && ../../bin/js-project-initialize && npm run build && npm run lint && cd ../../
scripts.test:js-library: cd tests/js-library/ && ../../bin/js-project-initialize && npm run build && npm run lint && cd ../../
scripts.test:backend-app: cd tests/backend-app/ && ../../bin/js-project-initialize && npm run build && npm run lint && cd ../../
scripts.test:frontend-app: cd tests/frontend-app/ && ../../bin/js-project-initialize && npm run build && npm run lint && cd ../../
scripts.test:app: cd tests/app/ && ../../bin/js-project-initialize && npm run build && npm run lint && cd ../../
scripts.test:cli: cd tests/cli/ && ../../bin/js-project-initialize && npm run build && npm run lint && cd ../../

author: York Yao
